mocafe.angie.base_classes

Base classes used only by mocafe.angie

Module Contents

Classes

BaseCell

Class representing a discrete cell agent. This class is inherited by both Tip Cells and Source Cells.

ClockChecker

Class representing a clock checker, i.e. an object that checks if a given condition is met in the surroundings of

Functions

fibonacci_sphere(n_points)

Returns n_points points evely distributed on a sphere of radius 1 using the fibonacci algorithm.
class mocafe.angie.base_classes.BaseCell(point: numpy.ndarray, creation_step)

Class representing a discrete cell agent. This class is inherited by both Tip Cells and Source Cells.

__eq__(self, other)

Return self==value.

__hash__(self)

Return hash(self).

get_position(self)

get cell position

Returns

tip cell position as numpy.ndarray

get_dimension(self)

get dimension (2D or 3D) for the cell.

Returns

2 for 2D, 3 for 3D

get_distance(self, point)

get the distance of the given point from the the cell

Parameters

point – the point to check the distance with

Returns

the distance

mocafe.angie.base_classes.fibonacci_sphere(n_points)

Returns n_points points evely distributed on a sphere of radius 1 using the fibonacci algorithm.

Parameters

n_points – number of points to spread on a sphere.

class mocafe.angie.base_classes.ClockChecker(mesh: fenics.Mesh, radius, start_point='east')

Class representing a clock checker, i.e. an object that checks if a given condition is met in the surroundings of a point of the mesh.

clock_check(self, point, function: fenics.Function, threshold, condition)

clock-check the given function in the surrounding of the given point

Parameters

  • point – center of the clock-check

  • function – function to check

  • threshold – threshold that the function has to surpass

  • condition – lambda function representing the condition to be met

Returns

True if the condition is met; False otherwise
